author: Alana Phillips
comment: I really wanted to like this app.  However after a while it stops tracking my steps from S Health.  My steps tracked by my Gear fit 2 pro show up in S Health and MyFitnessPal, both of which are connected to UA record, but the steps don't show in my UA app.  Might try this app again if that bug is fixed. Gonna stop using for now tho.

author: Gary Young
comment: I would give it a great, but it lags bad at times. It has even caused me to restart my phone. However, it's pretty accurate (gps in small spaces not so much)! It has lots of choices for exercises performed or if you need help designing a plan. It also links up to a lot of fitness apps and trackers. I just wish they would fix the lag/freeze up problem!

author: Laurel Lengyel
comment: I am having an issue, over the last 30 days UA Record has stopped talking to Samsung Health for my steps. Before that time they were talking to each other beautifully. Now Record is only counting about 1/4 of my steps recorded by my watch.  I have reloaded both apps on my phone, and am now at a loss as to why this is happening. Help please!

author: Steve Bluhm
comment: Only lists underarmor devices .  So if you have a fit bit or gear pro 2 you're forced to pick "heart monitor."  Synching is hit or miss and you can actually end up double counting workouts.  I give it a meh.

author: Chip B
comment: Do not even bother trying to link this to S Health. It works one minute and not the next. Troubleshoot till you're blue in the face and it won't work. Absolute junk. Update: 2/26/2018 the 2/20/2018 app update did not solve the problem.

author: Gerald Proffitt
comment: Integration with UA Band and Samsung Health is a nightmare. I have app permissions for sleep tracking is to sync with UA Band and exercise with Samsung Health, but suddenly it only wants to sync exercise with UA Band.  I checked my app settings and they are correct. When I check "My Workouts" it shows that it is syncing with UA Band. It worked just fine in previous app versions.

author: David Redstone
comment: Gear widget doesn't update. UA Record app doesn't sync properly with Samsung Health. When it does finally sync the steps are incorrect. Map My Run is good, but UAR is awful. Uninstalling from phone and watch.

author: Nicholas Palmer
comment: Constantly syncs poorly from Samsung health. Step counts are much lower, if it can't sync I can't see the point of this app.

author: Brian Blank
comment: Worked at one time, stopped syncing with Google Fit for nearly all of February 2018 and won't repopulate data even though it exists in Fit.

author: Thomas Stires
comment: App does not sync proper step count from Samsung Health
I use this with the UA Band and it works wonderfully all the time I have no lag or freezing on my phone either. It is simple to use and works great.

author: Eileen Bajor
comment: Wish my steps from samsung health would sync  sleep, calories and workouts all work

author: alan siew
comment: Can't good sync with Samsung health, Pls fix

author: Justin Sherbrook
comment: Under Armour rules the world

author: Neka Daniels
comment: Not syncing with my S health, not counting my steps properly

author: Wayne Wright
comment: Step count it way off from S health, and under armour help is no help. Time to look for a different app

author: andy crossman
comment: Has stopped syncing correctly with S Health.  Worked great until a month ago.

author: Brian Cowen
comment: It's okay

author: Carmen Gasbarro
comment: Awesome app so far!

author: Mayurkumar Nyk
comment: Awesome fitness app

author: Rick Emery
comment: This app is a crazy battery hog. I usually use Google fit. I turn off my internet while I'm working out to avoid notifications. I can start at 100% trying Bluetooth for 1.5 hours & my phone would be at 98%. With this app and everything else the same, my phone was at 86% and if I try to go into the app while my data is off, the phone freezes up for a bit. This app is supposed to import all the Google fit data and even though it is linked, it does not.

author: Morgan J
comment: There are a bunch of glitches and it doesn't always save my work outs. The most annoying  thing right now is that it logs my workout multiple times. I can't figure out why either, I don't have any apps linked and I am using the heart rate headphones  by UA.  Has good potential.

author: Terri Gocha-Kramer
comment: I really loved this app when I first started using it, however now it freezes during every workout and will not record my workout.   Has anyone experienced this and what did you so to fix it. I have sent many emails to the help desk, but so far it has  not been addresses. Would love some feed back.

author: Damien Burks
comment: It syncs with most other apps, but the sync is not always good. I have S Health and at first they worked together pretty well. Now I can't get UA to import my steps from S Health. This is the main reason I downloaded the app. I have tried trouble shooting and reporting the problem. UA just sends me an email telling me to try the trouble shooting tips, that I've already tried. I am using a Note 5, so maybe that has something to do with it, but anyway, I'm displeased with the performance of this app.

author: Joshua DeClercq
comment: I used to love this app. It still offers functionality other apps simply don't, but how can I take advantage of it when it just freezes during every workout it tracks? I've switched to Samsung Health, but I really miss UA's live stats and HR zone indication. But broken apps don't get used. Uninstalled.

author: Jaen Swart
comment: Worst fitness app and what a let down by a great brand like UA. Doesn't work on iPhone doesn't work on samsung.buggy as he'll. Workouts afe there in lig but not showing in dashboard. Drains battery. Hangs. Unusable.Just automated responses from support. Don't waste your time

author: arlene freeman
comment: when we pay more for the under armour name and purchase the under armour heart monitor, we expect the product to exceed expectations. the recent update didn't fix anything, actually made it worse. it doubles the workout time and doubles calories burned. it causes the phone to freeze  every.single.time. someone needs to get fired and the issues need to be resolved. Moto Z2...

author: Cassandra McPhail
comment: Could not get it to auto record my sleep, nutrition and steps. Had to enter info in manually. Using Samsung Gear Fit 2 Pro, and My Fitness Pal as data sources.

author: Terence Hall
comment: I loved this app previously. But since the recent updates it has become unreliable. It often becomes unresponsive or freezes during workouts. It also loses workout data immediately after you saved it.

author: Reggie Humphrey
comment: One of the most motivational fitness tracking apps I have used. It connects to many devices or other apps. It has changed the way I collect my data in fitness.  Updated: I've decided to lower my initial rating because the app has been experiencing glitches. Doubles the length of my workouts, doesn't sync my GearSport date consistently or my Fitbit Aria smart scale, and plus I've experienced a difficult time connecting the UA Heart Monitor.   Please update this app again UA. I loved it before and I want the same consistency as before.

author: Louise Esterhuizen
comment: The app was great for about 2 weeks. Then suddenly it stopped saving my workouts on my GearS3 even though it said it did. Reported it twice. Everytime my enquiry was closed without it being addressed. Decided to uninstall. There are other functioning apps out there.

author: Chris van Dassen
comment: Glitchy. Sometimes I log sleep and workouts but they don't show up, sometimes they post later but not sure why. It isn't a clean and easy experience. I still use it but the bugs are annoying and confusing.

author: marcia berg
comment: I love the app overall. The calories burned for steps is definitely not correct. It's giving me like a calorie for every 2 steps I take, so I am just sticking with my original calorie goal and ignoring the additional given for steps. Also, when I downloaded the app, it said that with the purchase of the UA Band,  I would be receiving an email with a code to get Myfitnesspal Premium for free. I never received that.

author: Ernesto Villapudua Noriega
comment: Works sometimes. I'm finding some days don't get tracked. Everything will work fine and then it won't update my activity for several days. Not sure if it's a syncing issue with device or S health app. If I can't use this app reliably it defeats the purpose.

author: Tino Garcia
comment: I love the dashboard but I don't like having to use Samsung health and MyFitnessPal this dashboard should be integrated into MyFitnessPal itself. A lot of information weight lifting workouts for example get duplicated coming out of Samsung Health into the Under Armour sweet

author: Brandon Wharton
comment: I give the app a 3 star only because the idea of the app is great. Unfortunately it dose not live up to its potential. Would be a solid 5 if everything worked, but with the fact that it dose not sync with the my fitness Pal or show logged calories and only about once a day is the step counter correct with Samsung health app I would really rate it as a 2 star.

author: Son Noelku
comment: I didn't think it was possible but now it's even slower. You hit like on a workout and it takes anywhere from 15 - 25 seconds to register. No sleep stats sync through Google Fit. No fixes for the Android Wear app. I've submitted a lot of feedback and have provided bug reports, not many were fixed with the new update sadly. Inching towards a one star.  *Update 12/10/17* Still sucks, high latency and same issues from years ago
Always crash and stopped, cannot login.. i have a competition going, and cannot join because of this.. please do not update if it make it worst..

author: Matt McAllister
comment: This app is amazing! But lately I've been having issues with it staying connected to MyFitnessPal to keep all of the stats updated. However, this works great in tandem with the Health Box and is a great way to get a handle on your health!

author: Jeremiah Johnson
comment: This app has a great design and layout, tells me everything I want, but it randomly stops working and syncing sometimes for hours sometimes for days, as a fitness tracker that does not work. If it had better integration it would be awesome. Barely better than a novelty as it is.
